channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 hospitalized after ski lift incident at Tahoe's Heavenly resort
item.description: At least five people were hospitalized after an incident on a Heavenly Ski Resort chairlift, officials confirmed Monday.

item.title: Legendary drug lord released from U.S. prison, deported to Colombia, freed

item.title: Trump wants mass deportations. A ride-along with immigration officers shows the challenges

item.title: WATCH: Santa Cruz wharf partially collapses amid high surf warning along California coast
item.description: Part of the Santa Cruz Wharf collapsed Monday after being battered by waves amid a high surf warning along the California coast.

WATCH: Kilauea volcano erupts on Hawaii’s Big Island
item.description: Scientists are monitoring air quality after Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupted early Monday, sending plumes of smoke and lava into the sky.

item.title: A blast at a Turkish armament factory kills at least 12 people
item.description: An explosion at an armament factory in northwest Turkey left at least 12 dead and four injured Tuesday morning

item.title: Bill Clinton hospitalized with fever, in 'good spirits': Spokesperson
item.description: Former President Bill Clinton has been hospitalized after developing a fever, a spokesperson said Monday.

item.title: Only 1 hospital in northern Gaza now able to provide services, say officials
item.description: Health officials say there is just one hospital left providing humanitarian aid services in northern Gaza amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war.
